details:
Announce of Kronolith H3 (2.0.6) (final):

> This [2.0.6] is a security release that fixes cross site
> scripting vulnerabilities in several of the calendar name
> and event data fields. None of the vulnerabilities can be
> exploited by unauthenticated users; however, we strongly
> recommend that all users of Kronolith 2.0.5 upgrade to
> 2.0.6 as soon as possible.
summary: kronolith -- Cross site scripting vulnerabilities in several of the calendar name and event data fields
